MOVE_FLEET: My mistake, calling my fleet back!
LIKE_GREET: Interesting! Another sentient race that I like!
DEFESIVE_PACT: We should join our defending forces?
ASK_PROTECTION: I'll pay for leaving my fleet alone for 5 star years!
ASK_MOVE_FLEET: Your fleet %1$s is on my sector!
OFFER_SPY_TRADE: Let's trade espionage information for 20 star years?
TRADE_EMBARGO: Let's make embargo for 20 star years against %1$s?
DECLINE_WAR: Your offer insulted us final time! Prepare to be anhilated!%1$s
NOTHING_TO_TRADE: My mistake, you had nothing to trade.
FRIENDS_GREET: Most interesting to meet with you my friend!
OFFER_REJECTED: Hmm, do you have counter offer?
DECLINE: This offer is not good enough.
DISLIKE_GREET: Meeting sentient being is interesting but are you a sentient?
DEMAND: Accept this offer or be anhilated!
HATE_GREET: Ah non-sentient spieces has learn how to speak...
INSULT_RESPOND: You do not seem sentient at all.
ASK_MOVE_SPY: Your espionage fleet %1$s is on my sector!
